descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**Welcome to PatchWorld** – The craziest social creative playground on XR! Explore, create, and publish worlds, virtual gear with friends worldwide in real-time multiplayer.

**For wild creatives of all kinds:** Musicians, visual artists, performers, educators, and creative explorers.

**What you can do in PatchWorld:**
- **Play & create** music, art, and games using community-made virtual devices
- **Explore & build** interactive worlds and virtual devices or assets made by you, or other Patchers
- **Jam & party** with friends in real-time multiplayer musical collaboration
- **Upload & generate** unique custom assets (3D meshes, samples, images, and more...) by uploading files to the web portal, or using AI generation directly in the app 
- **Record & publish** your avatar movements, voice, or images taken in PW to use in your creations to make storytelling games, recorded shows, and more
- **Learn & teach** to expand your music and patching skills with gamified in-game courses, or by joining and hosting live workshops in multiplayer
- **Connect your studio** gear and software with Midi, OSC, and mixed reality options, to expand your setup
- **Customize your Avatar** using the native PW avatar style, Ready Player Me, or our costume system to build crazy avatar attachments
- **Use your hands** with hand tracking to play music, create, and patch 


**Connect & Learn More** with our incredible community of Patchers on Discord, check out our full Wiki, or explore the app content on our web portal at patchxr.com
Join the creative revolution today!
